Definition: The average of the results received on the question "Are you satisfied or dissatisfied with your freedom to choose what you do with your life?”(0=no 1=yes) in an area
The average response to the question "Have you donated money to charity in the past month"
Average number of years that a person can expect to live in full health
The precentage of happiness in a country compare to the "world saddest country"(a dystopia where all the given column values are low)
The Gross domestic product-per-capita time series from 2019 to 2020.

The measure is the national average of the survey responses to two questions in the GWP: “Is corruption widespread throughout the government or not” and  “Is corruption widespread within businesses or not?”
